backend/main.mo: Implements a Motoko actor that analyzes explanations using static entries or fallback logic, with placeholder parsing for Gemini responses.
feature_evidence.json: Defines an empty feature evidence report structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides descriptions of various frontend files and their roles in the misconception analysis app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables and dark-mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing explanation input, validation, analysis requests, and result display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider for managing login, identity state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a React Query mutation that submits explanations to the backend and falls back to deterministic mock analysis if needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles configuring a warm neutral OKLCH color palette, typography, and dark mode support.
frontend/src/lib/analysisPrompt.ts: Exports the single authoritative prompt string used for generating misconception analyses.
frontend/src/lib/mockAnalysis.ts: Provides a deterministic mock analysis function that returns predefined misconception explanations based on pattern matching the user input.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and pending feature requests related to backend Gemini integration and analysis functionality.
